title: New edition of Glyphs manual available
content:
Noticed there is a new edition of the manual for venerable font editor Glyphs. Download via  
 [http://glyphsapp.com/getting-started/tutorials/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418164636/http:/glyphsapp.com/getting-started/tutorials/ "http://glyphsapp.com/getting-started/tutorials/")

BTW It looks very nice and is clear and concise — a model for software manuals.
author: Bert Vanderveen
